explains: n. 生物量；生物质能燃料

sentences.en: In fruit mature period, muskmelon had higher biomass in organic production system, but there was no significant difference on market yield in both systems.
sentences.cn: 果实成熟期，甜瓜在有机生产体系中生物量较高，但两种体系的市场产量差异不显著。

sentences.en: That matters because theory suggests that the maximum sustainable yield that can be cropped from a fishery comes when the biomass of a target species is about 50% of its original levels.
sentences.cn: 这一点很重要，因为理论表明，当目标鱼种的生物量为其原始水平的50%左右时，渔场才能达到可收获的最大可持续产量。

sentences.en: The biomass of Keteleeria has been investigated and analyzed.
sentences.cn: 对油杉种群的生物量进行了测定和研究。
